transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Shahnawaz ji baat kar rahe ho na?
Executive: Ji ji.
Executive: Shahnawaz ji Nidhi baat kar rahi hu India Mart se, account manager.
Customer: Ji ji.
Executive: Kaise hain sir aap?
Customer: Bas badhiya badhiya.
Executive: Sir aapko na ek issue aa raha tha aapke mobile app mein kuch.
Customer: Haan haan.
Executive: Leads vagaira pe click karte the ya to fir matlab India Mart ke app ko app mein kuch problem aa rahi thi. Web page is not available karke aa raha tha. Abhi na wo concern maine aapka internally department mein dala tha. To aap check
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Karo ek bar abhi bhi same issue aa raha hai ya wo solve ho gaya?
Customer: Ek second.
Executive: Ek bar apna app open karke dekhiye sir.
Customer: Maine asal mein uninstall kiya hua tha main chrome se kaam kar raha tha.
Executive: Nahi aap app install karo na sir wapas se main line pe hu aap karke dekho ek bari.
Customer: Haan ho gaya install wo kar raha hu.
Executive: Hmm hmm hmm. Login kariyega apne primary mobile number se. Ye number hai aapka 969 jisme end mein hai.
Customer: Haan bas ho gaya open ho gaya hai.
Executive: Ji ji.
Customer: Mujhe lagta hai same issue aa raha hai.
Executive: Abhi bhi same issue hai?
Customer: Lag to raha hai. Hmm.
Executive: Aap check karo ek bar ek do lead pe click karke dekho.
Customer: Koi lead show hi nahi kar raha hai.
Executive: Same aa raha hai web page is not available.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Ek bar wapas se aap screenshot dalenge kya Akanksha ko. Akanksha ka number hai na sir aap pe?
Customer: Hoga hoga kahin.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Ye issue issue kab se aa raha hai Shahnawaz ji?
Customer: Saat aath din ho gaye hain.
Executive: Saat aath din se aap chal hi nahi raha hai bilkul bhi ya fir lead consume nahi kar pa rahe ho?
Customer: Ah ye jo hai na by leads bhi nahi show ho raha hai manager bhi show nahi ho raha hai.
Executive: Achcha mobile app pe?
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Aapne isko laptop vagaira mein open karne ka try kiya aisa to nahi mobile mein kuch dikkat aa rahi ho ya fir aapne jo permission hoti hai na app ke liye wo permission to aisa nahi hai ki not allow kar diye us udhar.
Customer: Kya pata mere khayal se to.
Executive: Jab hum app install karte hain na koi bhi to hamesha app install karte time na hamesha wo permission mangta hai hamara mobile humse kuch matlab wo app humse kuch permissions mangta hai. Camera ki permission mangta hai, mic ki permission mangta hai aur gallery se photos aur documents lene ki permission mangta hai aur iske sath sath location ki permission mangta hai sir to usme hame allow karna hota hai ya while using this app karna hota hai. Usme aapne not to nahi karke de diya apne permission mein. Not allow karke.
Customer: Nahi wo to pehle bhi allow karke check kiya tha abhi bhi ye allow kar diya sab kuch.
Executive: Haan.
Executive: Achcha fir bhi yahi problem aa rahi hai?
Customer: Haan ab main dekhta hu lekin pehle bhi yahi problem thi allow karke. Shahnawaz ji ek kaam karoge aap agar aapke ghar mein koi mobile hai ek bar dusre mobile mein app chala ke apne number se login karke dekho na. Aapke pass hai koi abhi jinke pass mobile hai smartphone hai?
Customer: Main ghar jaunga sham ko to fir fir karunga.
Executive: Haan. Haan ek bar aap ek kaam kariyega aapka jo bhi dusra phone hoga na usme play store se ja ke India Mart ka app download karna. Waha pe jo bhi permissions wo mangega usko while using this app pe click karke permission de dena aap. Fir apne number se login karna ye jo maine abhi aapko registered number bataya hai na aapka.
Customer: Bilkul.
Executive: Us number se login karna aur agar us time pe bhi aapko same issue aayega to ek bar aap ye jo abhi aapne karke dekha iska screenshot Akanksha ko dal do aur agar sham ko bhi aapko same issue aata hai to ek bar uska bhi screenshot aap Akanksha ko dal dena sir. Kyunki main internal team se check kara rahi thi internal team ne to mujhe yahi bola hai ki ek bar aap client se wapas se connect kar lo hamari side se jo bhi problem thi wo resolve ho gayi hai.
Executive: Technical team mein humne dala hua tha ye.
Customer: Achcha achcha.
Executive: Ek bar please aap sham ko ya fir agar abhi aapke pass koi mobile hai ye zarur karke dekhiyega ek bar dusre mobile mein aap isko install karke app ko aur apne registered mobile number se usko login kariyega.
Customer: Ji ji.
Executive: Theek hai aur please agar us time pe bhi same issue aaye to ek bar Akanksha ko iska screenshot dal dijiyega sir.
Customer: Haan maine abhi dal diya unhone mujhe likha hai wapas ke mail aaya hai network connection change karke baat try karo.
Executive: Yahi yahi hamare pass aaya tha ki ek bar network connection change karke dikha lo kyuki kabhi kabhi network mein bhi sir kuch problem aati rehti hai na.
Customer: Ye aur to sab theek chal rahi hai.
Executive: Haan haan haan theek hai sir ek bar fir bhi aap dusre mobile mein zarur karke dekhiyega aapka network connection bhi change ho jayega. Mobile bhi change ho jayega dekhte hain ki mobile ka problem hai network ka problem hai ya hamare app ka problem hai ye pata chal jayega fir hame.
Customer: Ji ji.
Executive: Theek hai?
Customer: Okay okay.
Executive: Okay sir thank you.
Customer: Thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is facing issue with the app.

- Leads and manager are not showing in app.

- Facing issue since last 7-8 days.



Resolution:

- Executive suggested to check in another mobile.

- Executive asked to share screenshot with Akanksha.

- Asked to change network connection and try again.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will check in another mobile.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- app issue, leads, network, screenshot, permission
